intro: ^This town has a curious defense policy:
^They use the corpses of the recently deceased as soldiers.
^A Necromancer takes the interred bodies and brings them back to a semblence of life.
^Then they are thrown mercilessly at the invading undead seeking to attack the town.
^Corpse vs corpse in a stranglehold over the fate of this town.
plea: ^You are approached by a sobbing woman.
^Her husband explains to you that their son recently died

b: ^at the hands of the assaulting corpses

plea: ^They're seeking a dispensation for their son's corpse.

c-0: ^You have a quiet word with the Necromancer. He accepts your authority begrudgingly.
c-1: ^ and the defense can't spare a single corpse.
